meanings.definition: relating to the genetic makeup of an organism
meanings.sent1: The genotypically inherited traits determine the color of the flowers.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the genotypically different species of birds.
meanings.sent3: The genotypically similar twins confused their classmates.
meanings.sent4: The genotypically diverse forest was a mosaic of colors.
meanings.sent5: The genotypically linked genes were passed down through generations.

meanings.definition: in a manner that pertains to the genetic information of an individual
meanings.sent1: The DNA was genotypically analyzed to identify the genetic disorder.
meanings.sent2: She genotypically modified the plant to enhance its growth.
meanings.sent3: The cat genotypically chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were genotypically inherited from his ancestors.
meanings.sent5: The virus spread genotypically through the population.
